question.title: Getting error while deploying IcebergSink connector
question.body:
I am trying to deploy icebergSinkConnector. but while connector trying to write data getting error

Error: 'write.object-storage.path' has been depricated and will be removed in 2.0, use 'write.data.path' instead

I tried using write.data.path by instead of write.object-storage.path but still getting same error. also tried adding both property still getting same error.

Using iceberg-core version 1.10.0.
